data.title: Courteney Cox News, Pictures, and Videos
data.meta_description: Get the latest and most updated news, videos, and photo galleries about Courteney Cox
data.text:
Jennifer Aniston Brings Courteney Cox to Tears With Emotional Birthday Tribute

Jennifer Aniston honored her former Friends costar and longtime bestie Courteney Cox on her 60th birthday with a touching message.

Courteney Cox Says Late 'Friends' Co-Star Matthew Perry Still “Visits” Her

Courteney Cox is reflecting on her relationship with her late 'Friends' co-star Matthew Perry, and shares that she still feels his presence around her.

Courteney Cox Shares Matthew Perry Visits Her 6 Months After His Death

Courteney Cox reflected on her relationship with her late Friends costar Matthew Perry, and shared that she still feels his presence around her.

Courteney Cox Reveals Johnny McDaid Once Broke Up With Her One Minute Into Therapy

Courteney Cox shared insight into her relationship with Johnny McDaid, revealing the Snow Patrol rocker broke up with her during a therapy session back in 2015 before reconciling months later.

Matthew Perry's Death: Details of His Will Revealed

The late 'Friends' actor says he did not want any kids he would've had to be entitled to his fortune, according to his will.

Courteney Cox Reveals What She Does For Her Cold Plunges

Courteney Cox shares a glimpse inside her wellness practices, including a candid look at taking an icy cold plunge.

Courteney Cox Showcases Her Fit Figure in Bikini Before Plunging Into an Ice Bath

Courteney Cox shared a glimpse inside her wellness practices, including a candid look at taking an icy cold plunge.

Why Friends Cast Didn’t Host Matthew Perry Tribute at Emmys

Jennifer Aniston, Courteney Cox, Lisa Kudrow, Matt LeBlanc and David Schwimmer are always there for Friends costar Matthew Perry, but Emmys producers shared why they weren't part of a tribute.

Julia Roberts BREAKS SILENCE on Matthew Perry's Death

Julia Roberts recalls her time on 'Friends' and addresses the passing of her ex, Matthew Perry, who passed away Oct. 28.

Matthew Perry's Best Thanksgiving Scenes on 'Friends'

Following the recent loss of ‘Friends’ star Matthew Perry, we revisit a few of the actor's memorable scenes from the sitcom’s beloved holiday episodes.

Lisa Kudrow Thanks Matthew Perry in Touching Tribute

'Friends' star Lisa Kudrow is detailing her memories of the late Matthew Perry after his sudden passing at the age of 54.

Jennifer Aniston Honors "Little Brother" Matthew Perry

Jennifer Aniston and David Schwimmer are the latest 'Friends' cast members to pay tribute to Matthew Perry, sharing touching memories of the late star.

Friends' Courteney Cox Shares Memory of Matthew Perry

‘Friends’ star Courteney Cox shares a touching memory of the late Matthew Perry. The two starred as fan-favorite couple Monica & Chandler on the hit sitcom.

Matthew Perry's Death Certificate Released

The 'Friends' star's death certificate was released by the L.A. County Department of Public Health nearly a week after he was laid to rest.

Matthew Perry Laid to Rest at Private Funeral Attended by Friends Cast

Matthew Perry's Friends costars Jennifer Aniston, Courteney Cox, Lisa Kudrow, Matt LeBlanc and David Schwimmer said their farewells at a private memorial for the late actor on Nov. 3.

'Friends' Cast "Destroyed" After Matthew Perry's Death

'Friends' director James (Jim) Burrows is remembering Matthew Perry and the impact his death had on his former castmates in a new interview.

Inside Matthew Perry's Bond With His Fellow Friends Stars

Though he couldn't be any funnier, Matthew Perry credited Jennifer Aniston, Courteney Cox, Lisa Kudrow, Matt LeBlanc and David Schwimmer for propping him up when needed—which was often.
